nodes.text: Coruscant Green Park was a park area located on the planet Coruscant, filled with trees and elegant buildings. By the time of the Clone Wars, the park had become endangered. In an effort to preserve it, posters were put up around Galactic City in order to encourage people to take a stand and help protect the park. These posters were written in Aurebesh.
The poster seen in The Clone Wars episode "The Wrong Jedi" says "[faded]OTECT [faded]RUSCANT [faded]REEN PARK."
